steps: Prep the noodles and sauce by soaking noodles per package directions. Mix all sauce ingredients until combined; can be prepared ahead.

Stir fry eggs and vegetables by heating wok over high heat with oil. Swirl in beaten egg until fluffy; remove to bowl. Add oil, garlic, and pepper; bloom 30-45 seconds. Stir fry broccolini 1-2 minutes with sauce drizzle; set aside with eggs.
Brown the chicken by adding oil and chicken slices; brown 2 minutes each side. Season with sauce drizzle for color.

Bring it all together by returning broccolini and eggs to wok with drained noodles. Add sauce to coat. Stir fry 5-7 minutes until noodles soften and absorb sauce. Adjust texture with extra sauce or water if needed. Serve with white pepper.
title: Chicken Pad See Ew
